Directions: In a small mixing bowl, beat butter and Parmesan cheese until well blended. Add the flour, salt and cayenne; mix well. Divide dough in half. On a lightly floured surface; roll each portion into an 18-in. x 3-in. rectangle. Cut into 3-in. x 1/2-in. strips.
Place 1-in. apart on lightly greased baking sheets; brush with milk. Bake at 350 degrees F for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned.  Remove to wire racks to cool. Store in an airtight container.
